name: Secret snowman helps Santa
description:
Secret Snowman helps Santa is very simple Christmas arcade game for you to play during holiday season or whole winter season.

In Secret Snowman helps Santa you are controlling Snowman by touching your screen. Try to pick as many gifts as you can for Santa Claus. If you miss a gift you will lose 10% of your xmas spirit. You can upgrade your x-mas spirit and bonus speed of your Snowman in Shop with virtual money you make by picking gifts in game.

Developing quality apps and games like ours requires months of effort and dedication. To keep the development going and to recover our cost, this game uses ads for monetization. However, this game will not install any ad-related search bars on your phone or place ads in your notification bar.

A Merry Christmas and Happy New Year to you all!
